import React,{useState} from "react"; import {BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link, Switch} from "react-router-dom"; const Register = () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ name:"", email: "", password: "", password2:"", }) const [newUser, setNewUserData] = useState([""]) const HandleChange = (event) =>{ const {name, value} = event.target; return( setState(prevState => { return { ...prevState, [name]: value } }) ) } const HandleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setNewUserData((prevData) => { return[ ...prevData, state ] }); console.log(newUser); setState({ name:"", email: "", password: "", password2:"", }); } {/** "arrow" Back to home // small and grey Register below // everything big and Register bold Already have an account? Log in //small grey and log in is blue Name Email Password Confirm Password Sign Up*/} return (
